Class Backpropagation

java.lang.Object
AI.mcts.Steps.Backpropagation
public class Backpropagation extends Object
Implements the backpropagation phase of Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS). This class is responsible for updating win statistics and visit counts for all nodes along the path from a leaf node back to the root.

During backpropagation, each node on the path has its visit count incremented, and nodes whose player matches the winner have their win count incremented.

  • Method Details

    • backpropagate

      public void backpropagate(Node node, int winner)
      Backpropagates the result of a simulation from the given node up to the root. Updates visit counts for all nodes along the path, and increments win counts for nodes where the player who moved to reach that node is the winner.
      Parameters:
      node - the leaf node from which to start backpropagation
      winner - the ID of the winning player (0 for no winner, 1 for RED, 2 for BLACK)
